meanings.definition: A flat, round cake made of oatmeal.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious oatcake for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: My grandma bakes the best oatcakes in town.
meanings.sent3: The oatcake rolled off the plate and onto the floor, making the dog very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked oatcake.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the oatcake filled the kitchen, tempting everyone to have a bite.

meanings.definition: A type of biscuit or cracker made from oats.
meanings.sent1: I like to have an oatcake with my afternoon tea.
meanings.sent2: The oatcake was crunchy and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole an oatcake from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The oatcake crumbled like sand in my hand.
meanings.sent5: The golden brown oatcake looked irresistible on the plate.
